name: Spinball
description: Spinball is a fast, fun, and competitive multi-player sport game with non-stop scoring action. Rack up the points as you spin your paddles to smack the ball towards the goal, and try not to accidentally score against your own team!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.8 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 130 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.2 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Storage: 250 MB available space Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller recommended
